alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:45PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CALHOUN...SOUTHWESTERN GREENE...SOUTHWESTERN JERSEY AND NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Winfield, Hardin, Old Monroe, Fieldon, Batchtown, Foley, Otterville, Michael, Meppen, Beechville, and Nutwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
